[vc_row padding_top_multiplier=”3x” padding_bottom_multiplier=”3x” rc_bg_type=”color” tablet_sm_visibility=”hide” mobile_visibility=”hide” rc_bg_color=”#f6f6f6″ section_id=”features”][vc_column]


Features

[vc_column_text]

All Webkey packages include the full feature set of cloud service without limitations, however some capabilities require
root access to your Android device or a Webkey APK integration.

The LAN access is not part of the cloud service. This feature is purchasable in the application.

[/vc_column_text]

[vc_row_inner padding_top_multiplier=”” padding_bottom_multiplier=”” columns_gap=”none” rc_margin_bottom=”-30px”][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″ vertical_content_position=”middle” text_align=”center” rc_bg_type=”color” css=”.vc_custom_1614715514803{padding-right: 30px !important;padding-left: 30px !important;}”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1614716293838{padding-top: 25px !important;padding-right: 10px !important;padding-bottom: 25px !important;padding-left: 10px !important;}”]Standard Edition[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″ vertical_content_position=”middle” text_align=”center” rc_bg_type=”color” css=”.vc_custom_1614715436989{padding-right: 30px !important;padding-left: 30px !important;}” rc_bg_color=”#ffffff”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1612878564047{padding-top: 25px !important;padding-right: 10px !important;padding-bottom: 25px !important;padding-left: 10px !important;}”]

Business Edition

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner columns_gap=”none”][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″]

[vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1551718073196{padding-top: 25px !important;padding-bottom: 25px !important;}”]

Real-time remote view

[/vc_column_text]

[vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1636126391687{padding-top: 25px !important;padding-bottom: 25px !important;}”]Full remote control including touch and key events [/vc_column_text]
[vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1578827324224{padding-top: 25px !important;padding-bottom: 25px !important;}”]

File explorer

[/vc_column_text]

[vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1551794755205{padding-top: 25px !important;padding-bottom: 25px !important;}”]

Linux terminal access

[/vc_column_text]

[vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1552473117801{padding-top: 25px !important;padding-bottom: 25px !important;}”]

GPS-based location tracking

[/vc_column_text]

[vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1558685036316{padding-top: 25px !important;padding-bottom: 25px !important;}”]

Remote screenshot

[/vc_column_text]

[vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1561300361648{padding-top: 25px !important;padding-bottom: 25px !important;}”]

Screen recording

[/vc_column_text]

[vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1552473128578{padding-top: 25px !important;padding-bottom: 25px !important;}”]

Quick open URLs in Android

[/vc_column_text]

[vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1552473162706{padding-top: 25px !important;padding-bottom: 25px !important;}”]

Web Dashboard to monitor devices

[/vc_column_text]

[vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1552473154863{padding-top: 25px !important;padding-bottom: 25px !important;}”]

List installed packages through a Rest API

[/vc_column_text]

[vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1614715357865{padding-top: 25px !important;padding-bottom: 25px !important;}”]Install/Remove packages [/vc_column_text]
[vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1552473195592{padding-top: 25px !important;padding-bottom: 25px !important;}”]

Direct access to your device by nick name

[/vc_column_text]

[vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1625049260046{padding-top: 25px !important;padding-bottom: 25px !important;}”]Communication via Intents[/vc_column_text]
[vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1629724424889{padding-top: 25px !important;padding-bottom: 25px !important;}”]Device-to-Device control[/vc_column_text]
[vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1566632767965{padding-top: 25px !important;padding-bottom: 25px !important;}”]Configuration via intent [/vc_column_text]
[vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1558516624601{padding-top: 25px !important;padding-bottom: 25px !important;}”]Pre-installed Webkey client [/vc_column_text]
[vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1558467317569{padding-top: 25px !important;padding-bottom: 25px !important;}”]Headless version [/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″ rc_bg_type=”color”]
[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″ rc_bg_type=”color” rc_bg_color=”#ffffff”]
[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner]
Try Free
[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row padding_top_multiplier=”2x” padding_bottom_multiplier=”2x” rc_bg_type=”image” rc_bg_image_type=”parallax” rc_bg_image_size=”responsive” rc_bg_parallax_threshold=”0.1″ desktop_visibility=”hide” tablet_visibility=”hide” section_id=”features” rc_bg_color=”#f6f6f6″][vc_column tablet_sm_width=”1-2″ mobile_text_align=”center” mobile_column_order=”2″ css=”.vc_custom_1604141443288{margin-top: 15vh !important;}”]


Features

[vc_column_text]

All Webkey packages include the full feature set without limitations, however some capabilities require root access to your Android device or a Webkey APK integration.

[/vc_column_text]

[vc_column_text]

Standard Edition

Web Dashboard to monitor devices
Quick open URLs in Android
GPS-based location tracking
Remote screenshot
Screen recording
Linux terminal access
List installed packages through a Rest API
Direct access to your device by nickname
Device to Device control

All of the above, plus
Real-time remote view

All of the above, plus
Full remote control including touch and key events
Install/Remove packages

Business Edition 

All of the above, plus
Pre-installed Webkey client
Automatic Webkey app install after factory reset
Headless version
Configuration via intent (stop/start service, set fleet id, set server address)
Pre-installed Webkey client(stop/start service, set fleet id, set server address)

[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner]

Try Free
[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row padding_top_multiplier=”3x” padding_bottom_multiplier=”3x”][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1604141947123{margin-top: 10vh !important;}”]

Take control of your android device!

[vc_column_text]

Webkey gives you the control of multiple android devices through a browser based Dashboard.

[/vc_column_text]

[vc_tta_accordion c_icon=”triangle” c_position=”right” active_section=””][vc_tta_section title=”Real-time remote view” tab_id=”1613993572171-62e6b206-9dec”][vc_column_text]Get a view of your Android device in a central web dashboard from afar. An all-round feature, useful for everyone from home users to enterprises. With Webkey you only need a stable connection to have a full view of your Android device’s screen, running smoothly in realtime.This feature is your number one tool when you need to gather data from your devices or you need to follow any screen action on a remote device. If you have more than one device added to your Webkey account you can easily switch between them or even group them; all this done smoothless from a central place, your dashboard. This feature is available across all editions and does not require a rooted device.[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title=”Full remote control including touch and key events” tab_id=”1613993785220-bf5c5ec2-6202″][vc_column_text]Webkey lets you control your device remotely and fully – this means that the device will react just the same way as when it is controlled manually. This is a key feature that can be used for among other things for remote troubleshooting and educational purposes, just to name a few. Touch screen movements in the centralized web Dashboard are controlled by the mouse or touchpad and the keypad is used for the text input. Read how to use this feature without rooting your device. This feature requires a rooted device (but works without root on Samsung devices)[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title=”File explorer” tab_id=”1613993572466-d603374d-56f0″][vc_column_text]Webkey lets you control your device remotely and fully – this means that the device will react just the same way as when it is controlled manually. This is a key feature that can be used for among other things for remote troubleshooting and educational purposes, just to name a few. Touch screen movements in the centralized web Dashboard are controlled by the mouse or touchpad and the keypad is used for the text input. This feature requires a rooted device (but works without root on Samsung devices)[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title=”Linux terminal access” tab_id=”1614001598216-4c2207a3-b962″][vc_column_text]Webkey allows you to make changes under the hood remotely. This is an important feature if you would like to manage and maintain your Android device remotely, but can be especially useful for IT fleet management of enterprises devices. Available in all editions and does not require a rooted device.[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title=”GPS-based location tracking” tab_id=”1614001661503-194ef437-94ee”][vc_column_text]Webkey’s GPS based location tracking feature lets you locate and track your Android device on a map. In addition to this absolutely vital information about your device, this feature also opens a lot of opportunities; you can display information on your device depending on its location or gather information from the movement of devices in your fleet among many other things. No rooted device is necessary to be able to use this feature which is available across all editions of Webkey.[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title=”Remote screenshot and screen recording” tab_id=”1614001714858-a23a7e82-875b”][vc_column_text]From a broken screen, to collecting information for remote maintenance of fleet devices, this feature gives you a multitude of possibilities to handle your Android device remotely. In your dashboard, there will be a dedicated screenshot icon for you to take screenshots. The screenshot or recording then can be handled just as you would handle any similar file. This feature is included in all editions of Webkey and does not require the device to be rooted[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title=”Quick open URLs in Android” tab_id=”1614001774251-7f3ea58f-c49b”][vc_column_text]It is possible to set a URL that will open without having to type the URL – this is a useful feature for KIOSK mode or digital signage or other similar purposes as it allows you to display urls on remote devices from a central hub. No rooted device required and available in all editions of Webkey[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title=”Web Dashboard to monitor devices” tab_id=”1614001837070-58afaad3-ace1″][vc_column_text]This is the central control panel for you to manage your devices connected through Webkey. A smooth web interface with intuitive design for your ease, the Web Dashboard is capable of showing all connected devices, which you can name and group for a better overview.[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title=”List installed packages through a Rest API” tab_id=”1614001800352-a0dad9f4-c217″][vc_column_text]All our dashboard features can be controlled by REST APIs – please find more info http://webkeyapp.com/apidoc[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title=”Install/Remove packages” tab_id=”1614001866674-cd8e1e46-6d49″][vc_column_text]You can add and delete apps on your device with Webkey using install and remove packages.[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title=”Fleet ID” tab_id=”1614001884802-78d4f4e3-db32″][vc_column_text]When you have a larger fleet of devices, it can be problematic to roll out and pair all devices one-by-one, we at Webkey therefore offer you our Fleet ID solution: you will receive one unique key from us that will connect all your devices to your account without having to go through a long enrollment process consuming your time and money. This feature is part of our business edition only.[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title=”Direct access to your device by nick name/groups of…” tab_id=”1614001923537-27f41f4e-2c5c”][vc_column_text]Managing a group of devices can become chaotic. In your Webkey dashboard you can group and name devices in your fleet to have a better overview of the work at hand. Naming your device is available in the Free plan with just one device, grouping them only possible when there are more than one device added to your account.[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title=”Device to Device control” tab_id=”1629724983451-9d133957-ba7c”][vc_column_text]Control your device from another device within the app is possible with Webkey. We have optimized our app to support device to device control without having to open a laptop or a desk computer.[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title=”Sending Android intents” tab_id=”1625049389435-ed4e0e16-74a6″][vc_column_text]It is possible to send intents from your Dashboard to the controlled device(s). An intent is basically a passive data structure holding an abstract description of an action to be performed.[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title=”Headless version” tab_id=”1614001976362-f2edacff-0a05″][vc_column_text]Webkey comes installed on your devices, without the icon displayed. This feature allows you to run Webkey in the background, accessing all features but not disrupting the end device.  This feature available in the Business edition.[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title=”Configuration via intent” tab_id=”1614002000963-813e9b9a-3c80″][vc_column_text]Webkey can help you setting up devices using intents only to help you manage your devices in an automated manner instead of manual work. [/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title=”Pre-installed Webkey client” tab_id=”1614002023459-d3d1527a-9e2d”][vc_column_text]If you are an Android device manufacturer, Webkey will be happy to enter a technical cooperation agreement with you: To use our app to its best without rooting the device, a pre-installed Webkey app is the best solution. [/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][/vc_tta_accordion]
[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row padding_top_multiplier=”5x” padding_bottom_multiplier=”3x” rc_heading_color=”light” rc_bg_type=”image” rc_bg_image=”6281″ rc_bg_color_overlay=”dark” rc_bg_opacity_overlay=”20″ rc_font_color=”#ffffff” rc_bg_color=”#13171a”][vc_column width=”1/4″][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ text_align=”center”]

Cloud based App

[vc_column_text animation=”eut-fade-in-left-big” animation_delay=”300″]From personal use to Enterprise[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/4″][/vc_column][vc_column mobile_width=”hide”]
[/vc_column][vc_column desktop_hide=”hide” tablet_width=”hide”]
[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row section_type=”fullwidth” padding_top_multiplier=”” padding_bottom_multiplier=”” rc_heading_color=”primary-1″ columns_gap=”30″ equal_column_height=”equal” separator_bottom=”line-separator” separator_bottom_size=”50%”][vc_column width=”1/4″ rc_bg_type=”color” rc_add_shadow=”small-shadow” column_custom_position=”yes” position_top=”minus-5x” rc_bg_color=”#ffffff” css=”.vc_custom_1604146301541{padding-top: 20% !important;padding-right: 17% !important;padding-bottom: 20% !important;padding-left: 17% !important;border-radius: 3px !important;}”][vc_column_text]

Free

One device for all features. Want to give Webkey a try and see all features in action? Sign up for free and see it for yourself! Free, and always will be. We welcome all feedback and questions. Cloud based service, secure and user friendly.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/4″ rc_bg_type=”color” rc_add_shadow=”small-shadow” column_custom_position=”yes” position_top=”minus-5x” rc_bg_color=”#ffffff” css=”.vc_custom_1604146291451{padding-top: 20% !important;padding-right: 17% !important;padding-bottom: 20% !important;padding-left: 17% !important;border-radius: 3px !important;}”][vc_column_text]

Home

5 devices control via a cloud hosted app. Ideal for micro businesses as well as for friends and family, who may rely on you for technical support with their android devices. All features are available in the pricing plan, however it may require a rooted device.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/4″ rc_bg_type=”color” rc_add_shadow=”small-shadow” column_custom_position=”yes” position_top=”minus-5x” rc_bg_color=”#ffffff” css=”.vc_custom_1604146333480{padding-top: 20% !important;padding-right: 17% !important;padding-bottom: 20% !important;padding-left: 17% !important;border-radius: 3px !important;}”][vc_column_text]

Professional

From 10 devices upwards – recommended for all sizes of businesses. All features are available from the standard version of the app and the pricing based on the number of devices so you only pay for what you use. This plan comes with priority support to give you control over your business.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/4″ rc_bg_type=”color” rc_add_shadow=”small-shadow” column_custom_position=”yes” position_top=”minus-5x” css=”.vc_custom_1614699887016{padding-top: 20% !important;padding-right: 17% !important;padding-bottom: 20% !important;padding-left: 17% !important;}” rc_bg_color=”#ffffff”][vc_column_text]

Professional plus

This plan gives you the highly customizable business edition of the Android app. All features plus possibility for a headless client app, fleet ID and many more. Priority support at all times. We are happy to help your business grow.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row padding_top_multiplier=”5x” padding_bottom_multiplier=”3x” rc_heading_color=”light” rc_bg_type=”image” rc_bg_image=”6268″ rc_bg_color_overlay=”dark” rc_bg_opacity_overlay=”20″ rc_font_color=”#ffffff” rc_bg_color=”#13171a”][vc_column width=”1/4″][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ text_align=”center”]

Server based App

[vc_column_text animation=”eut-fade-in-left-big” animation_delay=”300″]Recommended for larger organizations[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/4″][/vc_column][vc_column mobile_width=”hide”]
[/vc_column][vc_column desktop_hide=”hide” tablet_width=”hide”]
[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row padding_top_multiplier=”” padding_bottom_multiplier=”” rc_heading_color=”primary-1″ columns_gap=”30″ equal_column_height=”equal” separator_bottom=”line-separator” separator_bottom_size=”50%”][vc_column width=”1/6″ column_custom_position=”yes” position_top=”minus-5x”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″ rc_bg_type=”color” rc_add_shadow=”small-shadow” column_custom_position=”yes” position_top=”minus-5x” rc_bg_color=”#ffffff” css=”.vc_custom_1604146291451{padding-top: 20% !important;padding-right: 17% !important;padding-bottom: 20% !important;padding-left: 17% !important;border-radius: 3px !important;}”][vc_column_text]

Dedicated server

Unlimited devices on a dedicated server, maintained and supported by your Webkey team. Recommended to fleet management and device providers. Highly customizable hosting options to match your needs![/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″ rc_bg_type=”color” rc_add_shadow=”small-shadow” column_custom_position=”yes” position_top=”minus-5x” rc_bg_color=”#ffffff” css=”.vc_custom_1604146333480{padding-top: 20% !important;padding-right: 17% !important;padding-bottom: 20% !important;padding-left: 17% !important;border-radius: 3px !important;}”][vc_column_text]

On Premise

Set-up by Webkey, and then supported and maintained by you. Recommended for tech savy organizations looking for any enhanced level of security with maximum independence. One off costs, and unlimited devices[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/6″][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row padding_top_multiplier=””][vc_column column_custom_position=”yes” position_top=”minus-2x”]

Find out more about server based solutions
[/vc_column][/vc_row]
